* Berend de Boer <berend@...> [2008-09-11 03:10]:
> I can't speak for XMPP BOSH, but for example with Apache, every
> open connection is 1 apache process. A server with 2GB memory
> with a typical PHP framework can run about 75 processes = 75
> users if we leave the connection open.

How is that the technique’s problem and not Apache’s?

Regards,
--
